module.name: iostream
module.short: Implement streams for handling standard input, output and stderr

descr.p: The iostream implements a descendent of THandleStream streams that can be used to read from standard input and write to standard output and standard diagnostic output (stderr).

element.name: TIOStream
element.short: Stream which handles standard input/output and stderr.

descr.p: TIOStream can be used to create a stream which reads from or writes to the standard input, output or stderr file descriptors. It is a descendent of THandleStream. The type of stream that is created is determined by the argument to the constructor. The handle of the standard input, output or stderr file descriptors is determined automatically.
The TIOStream keeps an internal Position, and attempts to provide minimal Seek behaviour based on this position.

descr.p: Create creates a new instance of , which can subsequently be used

element.errors: No checking is performed to see whether the requested file descriptor is actually open for reading/writing. In that case, subsequent calls to Read or Write or seek will fail.

element.name: TIOStream.Read
element.short: Read data from the stream.
element.descr: Read checks first whether the type of the stream allows reading (type is iosInput). If not, it raises a exception. If the stream can be read, it calls the inherited Read to actually read the data.
element.errors: An EIOStreamError exception is raised if the stream does not allow reading.

element.name: TIOStream.Read.Result
element.short: The number of bytes actually read

element.name: TIOStream.Read.Buffer
element.short: Memory buffer for the read data

element.name: TIOStream.Read.Count
element.short: Number of bytes to read

element.name: TIOStream.Write
element.short: Write data to the stream
element.descr: Write checks first whether the type of the stream allows writing (type is iosOutput or iosError). If not, it raises a exception. If the stream can be written to, it calls the inherited Write to actually read the data.
element.errors: An EIOStreamError exception is raised if the stream does not allow writing.

element.name: TIOStream.Write.Result
element.short: Number of bytes actually written.

element.name: TIOStream.Write.Buffer
element.short: Memory buffer containing the data to be written.

element.name: TIOStream.Write.Count
element.short: Number of bytes to write.

element.name: TIOStream.SetSize
element.short: Set the size of the stream
element.descr: SetSize overrides the standard SetSize implementation. It always raises an exception, because the standard input, output and stderr files have no size.
element.errors: An EIOStreamError exception is raised when this method is called.

element.name: TIOStream.SetSize.NewSize
element.short: New size for the stream/

element.name: TIOStream.Seek
element.short: Set the stream position

descr.p: Seek overrides the standard Seek implementation. Normally, standard input, output and stderr are not seekable. The TIOStream stream tries to provide seek capabilities for the following limited number of cases:

dl.dd: If Offset is larger than the current position, then the remaining bytes are skipped by reading them from the stream and discarding them, if the stream is of type iosInput.
If Offset is zero, the current position is returned. If it is positive, then Offset bytes are skipped by reading them from the stream and discarding them, if the stream is of type iosInput.

descr.p: All other cases will result in a EIOStreamError exception.

element.errors: An exception is raised if the stream does not allow the requested seek operation.

element.name: TIOStream.Seek.Result
element.short: New position of the stream.

element.name: TIOStream.Seek.Offset
element.short: Byte offset to position the stream on

element.name: TIOStream.Seek.Origin
element.short: Where to start the byte offset
